settings.title: Voer uw token in alstublieft
settings.userInfo: Als u de gebruikers verwijderd, moet u de gebruikers her-registreren in uw eigen Telegram Bot. Dit betekend dat u opnieuw het commando /start moet versturen.
settings.userInfoPassword: Om nu een gebruiker/chat te registreren moet je /start [jouwPaswoord] invoeren bij de bot via Telegram.
settings.questionInfo: Een bewerk modus van de vraag is gepland
settings.question: Vraag

questionSetup.title: How to use the question system
questionSetup.step1: Set up a question with the add a question feature.
questionSetup.step1-1: Enter a question e.g. 'Do you like pizza?'
questionSetup.step1-2: Enter any amount of answers below
questionSetup.step2: Send this question to your telegram via the "Send a question" THEN-flowcard
questionSetup.step3: Add a "A Question has been answered" WHEN-flowcard
questionSetup.step4: Use the token of the card to make your favorite flow!

howToSetup.title: How to setup
howToSetup.step1: Set up your own Telegram bot. This is fully secure and private, since you are the only one who can access the message archive. Enter @Botfather in the search tab of Telegram and choose the @Botfather bot.
howToSetup.step2:
Click “Start” to activate @BotFather bot or enter /newbot. 
/setjoingroup disables that the bot is allowed to join a group.
/setprivacy disabels that the bot can read messages inside a group
howToSetup.step3: Enter the Token inside the app settings
howToSetup.step4:
Write your bot over Telegram /start and follow the instructions
Each user has to also send the Bot the /start command. You can share the Bot via Telegram over the profile or search for the like you searched for the BotFather bot.
